vulnerability.name: USN-4745-1
vulnerability.description: David Benjamin discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled comparing certificates containing a EDIPartyName name type. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause OpenSSL to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2020-1971)  Tavis Ormandy discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled parsing issuer fields. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause OpenSSL to crash, resulting in a denial of service. (CVE-2021-23841)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in OpenSSL. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
